articles.title: Connor McDavid scores short-handed, sets up power-play goal in Oilers’ 3-1 win over Bruins
articles.description:
Pavel Zacha had a power-play score for Boston, which had won five of its last six. Jeremy Swayman made 22 saves.

articles.title: Man suspected of Brown University shooting found dead in N.H. storage facility, police say
articles.description:
A 48-year-old man originally from Portugal was behind the Brown University shooting, and took his own life in Salem, N.H., police said Thursday night.

The post Man suspected of Brown University shooting found dead in N.H. storage facility, police say appeared first on Boston.com.
